title: SolarWinds Orion Platform NCM VulnerabilitySettings Directory Traversal Arbitrary File Creation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create arbitrary files on affected installations of SolarWinds Orion Platform. Although authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability, the existing authentication mechanism can be bypassed.
The specific flaw exists within VulnerabilitySettings.aspx. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Fixed in Orion Platform 2020.2.1 Hot Fix 2 - released on 12/15/2020
timeline:
2020-10-14 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-09-20 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2022-05-26 - Advisory Updated
